bearing(Point) - Method in class edu.missouri.geom.Point

below(Point) - Method in class edu.missouri.geom.Polygon
Gives the point on the border of the polygon directly below the argument; if none exists, returns null.
BFSSadatDrone - Class in edu.missouri.drone.cooperative
This is an implementation of Sadat et al.'s breadth-first-search coverage algorithm, where a single, very high-altitude image is taken of the whole region, then that region is split into smaller rectangular subregions, with subregions containing no objects according to the initial image ignored.
BFSSadatDrone(Area, int) - Constructor for class edu.missouri.drone.cooperative.BFSSadatDrone
 
BFSSadatDrone(Area, int, double) - Constructor for class edu.missouri.drone.cooperative.BFSSadatDrone
 
BORDER - Static variable in class edu.missouri.geom.PolygonFactory
 
bottommost() - Method in class edu.missouri.geom.Polygon
Gives the bottommost point in the polygon (that is, the one with greatest y-value).
bottommost(double) - Method in class edu.missouri.geom.Polygon
Gives the bottommost point in the polygon (that is, the one with greatest y-value) at a given x-value, or null if none exists.
BoustrophedonDrone - Class in edu.missouri.drone.static_height
An offline drone which splits complex polygons into simpler ones using a vertical sweeping line, then covers each with a plow traversal.
BoustrophedonDrone(Area, int) - Constructor for class edu.missouri.drone.static_height.BoustrophedonDrone
Initializes the drone with the default energy budget.
BoustrophedonDrone(Area, int, double) - Constructor for class edu.missouri.drone.static_height.BoustrophedonDrone
Initializes the drone with a custom energy budget.
